strings.string: Small Village - A handful of people
Find a nice place to stay.
A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you.

Welcome to the small village project. Let's see what you can do with a handful of people (~25). Finally an opportunity to know all your villagers by name. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
Find a nice place to stay.
Easy Version. No human raiders. A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you.

Welcome to the easy version of the small village project. Let's see what you can do with a handful of people (~25). Finally an opportunity to know all your villagers by name. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
Reach a population of 23, make sure no Illuminati snuck in.
Hearth, Wood Pile, Rock Pile, Skins Dryer, Crafter, 3 tents, Storage Tent.
Reach a domestic animal population of 100.
Find a nice place to stay.
Easy Version. No human raiders. A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you.

Welcome to the easy verison of the medium map project. Let's see what you can do with a handful of people (~60). Finally an opportunity to know all your villagers by name. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
Find a nice place to stay.
A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you.

Welcome to the project medium Village. Let's see what you can do with a handful of people (~60). Finally an opportunity to know all your villagers by name. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
Find a nice place to stay.
A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you.

Welcome to a medium sized, altered Version of the Flatlands. Let's see what you can do with a bunch of people. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
Until the card bursts at the seams.
A deep gorge in the middle of the mountains with a fertile valley. You will never leave it, but others will surely find their way to you. Probably more than your little village can handle.

Welcome to the claustrophobic village project. Let's see what you can do with a bunch of people and no space. Challenge: Know all your villagers by name. You don't have any buildings yet. Tell your people to grab the skins and some nuts at their feet and send them to the best place for a settlement. (b)Enable primal vision(/b) mode, using menu button or pressing (primal_vision_key). Look where all the resources (flint, water, sticks, ore, and so on) are close together and build your village there. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!

Hey there, i hope you had a lot of fun. I updated the environment to get rid of the "flat" rivers for new games. You can continue your game or start new and use the watermill with rivers. If you like it, give it a thumbs up in the workshop! Have fun!
